goals.active: Recruit Barron and Fero for the defense of Claw Island.
goals.complete: I spoke with Barron and Fero about the fall of Claw Island. Their weapon would be perfect for our assault on Claw Island...if we can get it finished.

goals.active: Meet Barron and Fero and test their weapon.
goals.complete: Now that the weapon's complete, Barron and Fero have agreed to help us fight Zhaitan's forces at Claw Island. A resounding victory!
